    • Constructor Detail

      • Request

        public Request(String protocol,
               org.jdrupes.httpcodec.protocols.http.HttpRequest request,
               int matchLevels,
               Channel... channels)

        Creates a new request event with the associated Request.Completed event.

        Parameters:
        protocol - the protocol as reported by getRequestUri()
        request - the request data
        matchLevels - the number of elements from the request path to use in the match value (see matchValue)
        channels - the channels associated with this event

    • Method Detail

        public URI getRequestUri()

      • getDefaultCriterion

        public Object getDefaultCriterion()

        The match value consists of the event class and a URI. The URI is similar to the request URI but its path elements are shortened as specified in the constructor.

        As the match value is used as key in a map that speeds up the lookup of handlers, having the complete URI in the match value would inflate this map.

        Specified by:
        getDefaultCriterion in interface Eligible
        Overrides:
        getDefaultCriterion in class Event<Void>
        Returns:
        the class of this event
        See Also:
        Event.getDefaultCriterion()
